import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import MainLayout from './layout/MainLayout'; import './Home.css'; function Home() { const [activeTestimonial, setActiveTestimonial] = useState(0); // Auto-rotate testimonials useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setActiveTestimonial((prev) => (prev + 1) % testimonials.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const features = [ { id: 1, title: 'Discover Products', description: 'Browse thousands of quality products across multiple categories.', icon: 'üõçÔ∏è', link: '/vendi/all-products', color: 'var(--primary-color)' }, { id: 2, title: 'Become a Vendor', description: 'Start selling your products and reach thousands of customers.', icon: 'üè™', link: '/vendor/register', color: 'var(--accent-color)' }, { id: 3, title: 'Secure Payments', description: 'Safe and secure payment options for all transactions.', icon: 'üîí', link: '/about', color: 'var(--success)' }, { id: 4, title: 'Fast Delivery', description: 'Get your products delivered quickly to your doorstep.', icon: 'üöö', link: '/about', color: 'var(--warning)' } ]; const categories = [ { id: 1, name: 'All Products', icon: 'üõí', link: '/vendi/products/all', color: '#4CAF50' }, { id: 2, name: 'Home & Garden', icon: 'üè°', link: '/vendi/products/home-garden', color: '#4CAF50' }, { id: 3, name: 'Beauty', icon: 'üíÑ', link: '/vendi/products/beauty', color: '#E91E63' }, { id: 4, name: 'Food', icon: 'üçî', link: '/vendi/products/food', color: '#FF9800' }, { id: 5, name: 'Electronics', icon: 'üì±', link: '/vendi/products/electronics', color: '#2196F3' }, { id: 6, name: 'Clothing', icon: 'üëó', link: '/vendi/products/clothing', color: '#9C27B0' }, { id: 7, name: 'Sports', icon: '‚öΩ', link: '/vendi/products/sports-outdoor', color: '#00BCD4' } ]; const testimonials = [ { id: 1, content: "MarketConnect has transformed my small business. I've reached customers I never thought possible!", name: "John Davis", role: "Vendor, Organic Foods", avatar: "üë®‚Äçüíº" }, { id: 2, content: "The variety of products and ease of shopping makes this my go-to marketplace for everything I need.", name: "Sarah Miller", role: "Customer", avatar: "üë©‚Äçüíº" }, { id: 3, content: "From registration to sales, the entire process is streamlined. I couldn't be happier with the results.", name: "Michael Chen", role: "Vendor, Kitchen Supplies", avatar: "üë®‚Äçüç≥" } ]; return (
